asset"}},"AssetDepositDecrementEvent(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount decremented","assetId":"The ID of the implementation","params":{"newImplementation":"Address of the new implementation contract"}},"CoreUpdateEvent(address)":{"params":{"_Core":"The new Core contract address"}},"CutUpdateEvent(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_cut":"The new cut percentage value","_id":"The ID of the asset"}},"FeeUpdateEvent(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_depositFee":"The new deposit fee value in basis points","_id":"The ID of the asset","_insuranceFee":"The new insurance points"}},"LimitUpdateEvent(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_id":"The ID of the asset","_limit":"The new limit value"}},"OracleUpdateEvent(uint256,address)":{"params":{"_id":"The ID of the asset","_oracle":"The new oracle address for price feeds"}},"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted to signal this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"},"SetupAssetEvent(uint256,(uint256,string,string,uint8,bool,uint8,uint256,uint256,address,address,address,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes))":{"params":{"_Assetdata":"The complete asset definition containing all configuration parameters including contract addresses, fee structures, limits, and durations","_id":"The ID of the setup asset"}},"TreasuryUpdateEvent(address)":{"params":{"_treasury":"The new treasury address"}},"TrustedForwarderUpdated(address,address)":{"details":"Indicates a change in the trusted forwarder for meta-transactions","params":{"newForwarder":"The address of the new trusted forwarder","previousForwarder":"The address of the previous trusted forwarder"}},"durationUpdateEvent(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_duration":"The new main duration value in seconds","_id":"The ID of the asset","_yieldDuration":"The new yield duration value in seconds"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addAsset(string,string,uint8,bool)":{"details":"Only callable by admin role","params":{"_aggType":"Aggregation type flag","_desc":"Description of the asset","_name":"The name of the asset","_type":"Asset type identifier"},"returns":{"_0":"The asset ID of the newly added asset"}},"decrementAssetDeposits(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by Core contract","params":{"_amount":"The amount to decrement deposits by","_id":"The ID of the asset to decrement deposits for"}},"disableAsset(uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by admin role","params":{"_id":"Asset ID to disable"}},"enableAsset(uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by admin role","params":{"_id":"Asset ID to enable"}},"fetchAssetData(uint256)":{"params":{"_id":"Asset ID to query"},"returns":{"_0":"The AssetDefinition struct containing all asset data"}},"fetchAssetElement(uint256,uint8)":{"details":"Flag values: 0=name, 1=description, 2=contractType, 3=isAggregated, 4=isDisabled,                   5=isSetup, 6=cut, 7=limit, 8=token, 9=issuer, 10=rewardDistributor, 11=vault","params":{"_flag":"The flag indicating which element to fetch","_id":"The ID of the asset to fetch from"},"returns":{"_0":"The requested element value encoded as bytes"}},"fetchCore()":{"returns":{"_0":"The address of the Core contract"}},"fetchCounter()":{"details":"The counter tracks the total number of assets added to the registry","returns":{"_0":"The current counter value"}},"fetchDeposits(uint256)":{"params":{"_assetID":"The ID of the asset to query"},"returns":{"_0":"The total amount deposited for the specified asset"}},"fetchTreasury()":{"returns":{"_0":"The address of the treasury contract"}},"fetchUSSTToken()":{"details":"This represents the main stablecoin contract address","returns":{"_0":"The contract address of the USD-Pegged token"}},"fetchYLDToken()":{"details":"This represents the interest-bearing stablecoin contract address","returns":{"_0":"The contract address of the USD-Interest token"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {AccessControl-_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"incrementAssetDeposits(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by admin or authorized contracts","params":{"_amount":"The amount to increment deposits by","_id":"The ID of the asset to increment deposits for"}},"isDepositLimitReached(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_amount":"The amount proposed to be deposited","_assetID":"The ID of the asset to check deposit limit for"},"returns":{"_0":"True if the deposit limit would be exceeded, false otherwise"}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role."},"setAdditionalBuffer(uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Only callable by admin role","params":{"_data":"Additional buffer data to store as bytes","_id":"The ID of the asset"}},"setCore(address)":{"details":"Only callable by admin role","params":{"_Core":"The new Core contract address"}},"setCut(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by admin role","params":{"_cut":"The new cut percentage","_id":"The ID of the asset"}},"setDurations(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by admin role","params":{"_duration":"The main duration parameter for the asset's operations, measured in seconds","_id":"The ID of the asset to update durations for","_yieldduration":"The duration parameter specifically for yield calculations, measured in seconds"}},"setFees(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"custom:error":"Pi_InvalidFeePercentage if any fee exceeds 100% (10000 basis points)","details":"Only callable by admin role, all fees are in basis points (10000 = 100%)","params":{"_depositFee":"The new deposit fee percentage in basis points","_id":"The ID of the asset","_insuranceFee":"The new insurance fee percentage in basis points","_withdrawFee":"The new withdrawal fee percentage in basis points","_yieldFee":"The new yield fee percentage in basis points"}},"setLimit(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by admin role","params":{"_id":"The ID of the asset","_limit":"The new limit value"}},"setOracle(uint256,address)":{"details":"Only callable by admin role","params":{"_id":"The ID of the asset","_oracle":"The new oracle address"}},"setTreasury(address)":{"details":"Only callable by admin role","params":{"_treasury":"The new treasury address"}},"setupAsset(uint256,address,address,address,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"custom:error":"Pi_SetupAlreadyDone if the asset has already been set upPi_InvalidAssetSetup if the asset ID is invalidPi_InvalidFeePercentage if any fee exceeds 100% (10000 basis points)","custom:event":"SetupAssetEvent emitted when the asset is successfully set up","details":"Only callable by admin role and allows setting all key parameters for an asset","params":{"_additionalBytes":"Additional configuration data stored as bytes","_contractAddr":"The primary token contract address for the asset","_cut":"Percentage cut applied to the asset's transactions","_depositFee":"Fee charged for depositing the asset (in basis points)","_distAddr":"Address of the reward distribution contract","_duration":"Main duration parameter for protocol operations (in seconds)","_id":"The unique identifier of the asset to configure","_insuranceFee":"Insurance fee applied (in basis points)","_issuanceAddr":"Address responsible for issuing the asset tokens","_limit":"Maximum value/cap for the asset","_oracle":"Address of the price oracle for the asset","_vaultAddr":"Address of the asset's vault contract","_withdrawFee":"Fee charged for withdrawing the asset (in basis points)","_yieldDuration":"Duration specifically for yield calculations (in seconds)","_yieldFee":"Fee applied to yield generation (in basis points)"}},"trustedForwarder()":{"details":"Used by ERC2771Context to validate meta-transaction relayers","returns":{"_0":"The address of the current trusted forwarder"}},"updateTrustedForwarder(address)":{"custom:event":"Emits TrustedForwarderUpdated with previous and new forwarder addresses","details":"Only callable by admin role, updates the address used for ERC2771 meta-transactions","params":{"_newForwarder":"The new trusted forwarder address to be used"}}},"title":"STBL Register returns._0: The asset ID of the newly added asset

params._amount: The amount to decrement deposits by
params._id: The ID of the asset to decrement deposits for

returns._0: The AssetDefinition struct containing all asset data

params._flag: The flag indicating which element to fetch
params._id: The ID of the asset to fetch from

returns._0: The requested element value encoded as bytes
The address of the Core contract

fetchCounter().details: The counter tracks the total number of assets added to the registry

params._assetID: The ID of the asset to query

returns._0: The total amount deposited for the specified asset
The address of the treasury contract

fetchUSSTToken().details: This represents the main stablecoin contract address

returns._0: The contract address of the USD-Pegged token

fetchYLDToken().details: This represents the interest-bearing stablecoin contract address

returns._0: The contract address of the USD-Interest token

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {AccessControl-_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

incrementAssetDeposits(uint256,uint256).details: Only callable by admin or authorized contracts

params._amount: The amount to increment deposits by
params._id: The ID of the asset to increment deposits for

params._amount: The amount proposed to be deposited
params._assetID: The ID of the asset to check deposit limit for

returns._0: True if the deposit limit would be exceeded, false otherwise

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

params._data: Additional buffer data to store as bytes

params._duration: The main duration parameter for the asset's operations, measured in seconds
params._id: The ID of the asset to update durations for
params._yieldduration: The duration parameter specifically for yield calculations, measured in seconds

setFees(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,.custom:error: Pi_InvalidFeePercentage if any fee exceeds 100% (10000 basis points)
setFees(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,.details: Only callable by admin role, all fees are in basis points (10000 = 100%)

params._depositFee: The new deposit fee percentage in basis points
params._insuranceFee: The new insurance fee percentage in basis points
params._withdrawFee: The new withdrawal fee percentage in basis points
params._yieldFee: The new yield fee percentage in basis points

setupAsset(uint256,address,address,addre.custom:error: Pi_SetupAlreadyDone if the asset has already been set upPi_InvalidAssetSetup if the asset ID is invalidPi_InvalidFeePercentage if any fee exceeds 100% (10000 basis points)
setupAsset(uint256,address,address,addre.custom:event: SetupAssetEvent emitted when the asset is successfully set up
setupAsset(uint256,address,address,addre.details: Only callable by admin role and allows setting all key parameters for an asset

params._additionalBytes: Additional configuration data stored as bytes
params._contractAddr: The primary token contract address for the asset
params._cut: Percentage cut applied to the asset's transactions
params._depositFee: Fee charged for depositing the asset (in basis points)
params._distAddr: Address of the reward distribution contract
params._duration: Main duration parameter for protocol operations (in seconds)
params._id: The unique identifier of the asset to configure
params._issuanceAddr: Address responsible for issuing the asset tokens
params._oracle: Address of the price oracle for the asset
params._vaultAddr: Address of the asset's vault contract
params._withdrawFee: Fee charged for withdrawing the asset (in basis points)
params._yieldDuration: Duration specifically for yield calculations (in seconds)
params._yieldFee: Fee applied to yield generation (in basis points)

trustedForwarder().details: Used by ERC2771Context to validate meta-transaction relayers

returns._0: The address of the current trusted forwarder

updateTrustedForwarder(address).custom:event: Emits TrustedForwarderUpdated with previous and new forwarder addresses
updateTrustedForwarder(address).details: Only callable by admin role, updates the address used for ERC2771 meta-transactions

params._newForwarder: The new trusted forwarder address to be used

addAsset(string,string,uint8,bool).notice: Adds a new asset to the registry

decrementAssetDeposits(uint256,uint256).notice: Decrements the total deposits for a specific asset

disableAsset(uint256).notice: Disables an asset in the registry

fetchAssetData(uint256).notice: Retrieves the complete data for a specific asset

fetchAssetElement(uint256,uint8).notice: Retrieves specific element of asset data based on flag

fetchDeposits(uint256).notice: Retrieves the total deposit amount for a specific asset

fetchUSSTToken().notice: Fetches the USST-Pegged token contract address used in the system

fetchYLDToken().notice: Fetches the USD-Interest token contract address used in the system

incrementAssetDeposits(uint256,uint256).notice: Increments the total deposits for a specific asset

isDepositLimitReached(uint256,uint256).notice: Checks if adding a deposit amount would exceed the asset's deposit limit

setAdditionalBuffer(uint256,bytes).notice: Sets additional buffer data for an asset

setCut(uint256,uint256).notice: Sets the cut percentage for an asset

setDurations(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Sets the duration parameters for a specific asset

setFees(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,.notice: Sets the fee structure for an asset

setLimit(uint256,uint256).notice: Sets the limit for an asset

setOracle(uint256,address).notice: Sets the oracle address for an asset

setupAsset(uint256,address,address,addre.notice: Sets up an asset with contract addresses and configuration parameters

trustedForwarder().notice: Returns the address of the trusted forwarder for meta-transactions

updateTrustedForwarder(address).notice: Updates the trusted forwarder address for meta-transactions
